summary: I always like Ysolda but REALLY didn\'t like the way she looked so I improved her.
descriptionHtml:
[b][color=limegreen]If you want to try out the now beta version of my Ysolda with the Ren\'s 17 hair, you must first download the [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5152]Beautiful Hair Retexture[/url] mod and install the hair from the mirror, the [url=http://dl.dbank.com/c06a4f5w10]Beautiful Hair 1.2[/url], and then download and install the retexture of you choice from their files section as well. I am using the \"calm\" (sorry for saying wild new) texture in my image. Let me know if it works for you.[/color][/b]

I always liked Ysolda\'s personality and dialogue but REALLY didn\'t like the way she looked so I improved her. This is to my personal tastes of course but seeing as I had one request to release this as a mod, I will just go ahead and release this as a way to pay it forward for all of the times I have requested things and got them.
Check out my other mods, 
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6136]Sylgja Improved[/url]
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6301]Lydia marriage fixed and more[/url]

[b][color=yellow]image explanations[/color][/b]
Ysolda Improved (Sigrid as a base old version)
less serious...well an attempt lol (Sigrid as a base old version)
Ysolda Sylgja variant wench (Sylgia as a base)<---sorry about the time of day variance
Ysolda Sylgja variant party (Sylgia as a base)
Annekke as a base not serious. (Annekke from Darkwater Crossing as a base) This is the one I use now.

[b][color=yellow]Requirements....[/color][/b]
This uses all vanilla items as a base so you can use it without these mods but she will look different. (and not as good IMHO)
I use [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2812]Bella\'s better females[/url] mod with either makeup version 1 or less makeup...I can\'t remember which but the makeup is lightly applied. Use your own makeup version or hot chick mod or leave her vanilla if you want. I would love to see screenies of what she looks like without the required mods installed or with different mods installed like [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3563]Cover Women[/url] which is also very savory.
I use the [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5577]Ashara Romantic Outfit[/url] by SydneyB as the Party outfit replacer. If you don\'t use that mod, she defaults to the same clothing as Taarie in Solitude wears which is the same model the party outfit uses for females. I of course just replaced the texture of the corset with the white for the Ashara Outfit. If you don\'t, her outfit will be whatever color you chose when you installed that mod.
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666]CBBE nevernude[/url] mod which accentuates the [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5577]Ashara Romantic Outfit[/url]. I am not sure how other body mods will work with the Ashara outfit. 

[b][color=yellow]Installation....[/color][/b]
[b][color=limegreen]choose just one version. they over write each other.[/color][/b]
just unzip the file using 7-Zip to a temp folder and drop the contents into your data folder and let it over write. Then go into your launcher, select data files and tic the Ysolda.esp or activate it in whatever MM you might be using. I don\'t download with NMM so if the file structure I am using doesn\'t work for that, PM me with how the file structure should be and I will upload a NMM version.

[b][color=yellow]Uninstallation....[/color][/b]
delete the Ysolda.esp out of your data folder and the 00013bab file out of your data\\meshes\\actors\\character\\facegendata\\facegeom\\skyrim.esm folder.
author: XTR3M368
